# Score

# Classes

Score

Represents a full musical score consisting of a number of voices.

# Members

duration ⇒ string

Returns the duration the score will use when adding a new member to a measure.

duration

Sets the duration for the score's current measure next data input.

name ⇒ string

Returns the score name.

name

Set the score's name.

bpm ⇒ number

Get the score's BPM value.

bpm

Set the score's BPM value.

voices ⇒ Array

Returns an array of voices where each voice represents an instrument.

# Functions

getMeasureSize(timeSignature) ⇒ number

Returns the maximum size a measure has, calculated using the time signature.

setTimeSignature(timeSignature)

Set the score's time signature.

setMeasureDuration(measureIndex, [voiceIndex])

Sets the duration for a measure.

getVoice([index]) ⇒ false | Array

Returns the voice at the index, starts from voice 0.

addVoice()

Adds a new voice to the score, initialized with one empty measure.

deleteVoice(index) ⇒ Array

Deletes a voice from the score.

getMeasure(measureIndex, [voiceIndex])

Returns a measure from a voice

addMeasure(index, [voiceIndex], [measure])

Add measure to a voice at an index.

addNote(note, [duration], position, measureIndex, [voiceIndex]) ⇒ boolean

Add a note to a measure in one of the voices.

addNotes(notes, [duration], position, measureIndex, [voiceIndex]) ⇒ boolean

Add notes to a measure in one of the voices.

addChord(notes, name, [duration], position, measureIndex, [voiceIndex]) ⇒ boolean

Add notes to a measure in one of the voices with a name for representing a chord.

deleteNote(note, position, measureIndex, [voiceIndex]) ⇒ boolean

Delete a note from a measure in one of the voices.

deleteNotes(notes, position, measureIndex, [voiceIndex]) ⇒ boolean

Delete notes from a measure in one of the voices.

clearMeasure(measureIndex, [voiceIndex]) ⇒ boolean

Clears a measure.

deleteMeasure(measureIndex, [voiceIndex]) ⇒ boolean

Deletes a measure.

cloneMeasure(measureIndex, [voiceIndex]) ⇒ boolean

Clones a measure inside a voice and adds the clone next to the original measure.

transpose(interval, voice)

Transposes a voice in the score.

# Score

Represents a full musical score consisting of a number of voices.

Kind: global class

# new Score()

Param Type Default Description
[attributes.bpm] number 100 The bpm for the score.
[attributes.timeSignature] Array [4,4] Time signature for the score.
[attributes.name] string "my_score" Name for the score.

# duration ⇒ string

Returns the duration the score will use when adding a new member to a measure.

Kind: global variable

# duration

Sets the duration for the score's current measure next data input.

Kind: global variable

Param Type
duration string

# name ⇒ string

Returns the score name.

Kind: global variable

Set the score's name.

Kind: global variable

Param Type
name string

# bpm ⇒ number

Get the score's BPM value.

Kind: global variable

Set the score's BPM value.

Kind: global variable

Param
bpm

# voices ⇒ Array

Returns an array of voices where each voice represents an instrument.

Kind: global variable

# getMeasureSize(timeSignature) ⇒ number

Returns the maximum size a measure has, calculated using the time signature.

Kind: global function
Throws:

  • Error
Param Type
timeSignature Array

# setTimeSignature(timeSignature)

Set the score's time signature.

Kind: global function

Param
timeSignature

# setMeasureDuration(measureIndex, [voiceIndex])

Sets the duration for a measure.

Kind: global function

Param Type Default Description
measureIndex number The measure index to set the duration to.
[voiceIndex] number 0 The voice the measure belongs to.

# getVoice([index]) ⇒ false | Array

Returns the voice at the index, starts from voice 0.

Kind: global function
Throws:

  • Error
Param Type Default Description
[index] number 1 The voice index.

# addVoice()

Adds a new voice to the score, initialized with one empty measure.

Kind: global function

# deleteVoice(index) ⇒ Array

Deletes a voice from the score.

Kind: global function
Throws:

  • Error
Param Type Description
index number The index of the voice to delete.

# getMeasure(measureIndex, [voiceIndex])

Returns a measure from a voice

Kind: global function

Param Type Default Description
measureIndex number The index of the measure.
[voiceIndex] number 0 The index of the voice that the measure belongs to.

# addMeasure(index, [voiceIndex], [measure])

Add measure to a voice at an index.

Kind: global function

Param Type Default Description
index number Index to add the measure at.
[voiceIndex] number 0 The index of the voice.
[measure] Measure Measure to add.

# addNote(note, [duration], position, measureIndex, [voiceIndex]) ⇒ boolean

Add a note to a measure in one of the voices.

Kind: global function

Param Type Default Description
note string Raw note.
[duration] string "measure.duration"
position number Position in the measure to add the note to.
measureIndex number The index of the measure to add the note to.
[voiceIndex] number 0 The index of the voice to add the note to.

# addNotes(notes, [duration], position, measureIndex, [voiceIndex]) ⇒ boolean

Add notes to a measure in one of the voices.

Kind: global function

Param Type Default Description
notes obj.Array An array of raw note.
[duration] obj.string measure.duration
position number Position in the measure to add the notes to.
measureIndex number The index of the measure to add the notes to.
[voiceIndex] number 0 The index of the voice to add the notes to.

# addChord(notes, name, [duration], position, measureIndex, [voiceIndex]) ⇒ boolean

Add notes to a measure in one of the voices with a name for representing a chord.

Kind: global function

Param Type Default Description
notes obj.Array An array of raw note.
name obj.name Name of the chord.
[duration] obj.string measure.duration
position number Position in the measure to add the notes to.
measureIndex number The index of the measure to add the notes to.
[voiceIndex] number 0 The index of the voice to add the notes to.

# deleteNote(note, position, measureIndex, [voiceIndex]) ⇒ boolean

Delete a note from a measure in one of the voices.

Kind: global function

Param Type Default Description
note string Raw note.
position number Position in the measure to add the note to.
measureIndex number The index of the measure to add the note to.
[voiceIndex] number 0 The index of the voice to add the note to.

# deleteNotes(notes, position, measureIndex, [voiceIndex]) ⇒ boolean

Delete notes from a measure in one of the voices.

Kind: global function

Param Type Default Description
notes Array An array of raw note.
position number Position in the measure to add the notes to.
measureIndex number The index of the measure to add the notes to.
[voiceIndex] number 0 The index of the voice to add the notes to.

# clearMeasure(measureIndex, [voiceIndex]) ⇒ boolean

Clears a measure.

Kind: global function

Param Type Default Description
measureIndex number The index of the measure to clear.
[voiceIndex] number 0 The index of the voice the measure belongs to.

# deleteMeasure(measureIndex, [voiceIndex]) ⇒ boolean

Deletes a measure.

Kind: global function

Param Type Default Description
measureIndex number The index of the measure to delete.
[voiceIndex] number 0 The index of the voice the measure belongs to.

# cloneMeasure(measureIndex, [voiceIndex]) ⇒ boolean

Clones a measure inside a voice and adds the clone next to the original measure.

Kind: global function

Param Type Default Description
measureIndex number The index of the measure to clone.
[voiceIndex] number 0 The index of the voice the measure belongs to.

# transpose(interval, voice)

Transposes a voice in the score.

Kind: global function

Param Type Description
interval number The interval to transpose by.
voice number Index of the voice to transpose.
